news.markdown:
**BRAND NEW SHOW!** 

We are currently in creation for our new work  _Lovely Girls_ which will present as a work in progress 7th/8th November at The Wardrobe Theatre in Bristol. Tickets are ON SALE NOW (see performance dates)

Tickets are also on sale for our Open Level Workshop @ The Wardrobe Theatre, 7th November. Spaces for this workshop are limited so book now to avoid disappointment! 
**[Book onto our workshop HERE](http://thewardrobetheatre.com/livetheatre/workshop-hiccup-project/)**

events.markdown:
**"It's Okay, I'm Dealing With It."**
13th October (World Mental Health Day): Dance Live, ABERDEEN **[More info](https://citymoves.org.uk/event/its-ok-im-dealing-with-it/)**



**_May-We-Go-Round?_**
18th October: Deda, DERBY **[Tickets](http://www.deda.uk.com/whats-on/hiccup-project-may-we-go-round/)**

7th November: The Wardrobe Theatre, BRISTOL  **[Tickets](http://thewardrobetheatre.com/livetheatre/lovely-girls/)**
